product_name: Pearl Izumi P.R.O. In-R-Cool Bike Bib Shorts - Men's
long_description: Pearl Izumi P.R.O. In-R-Cool Bike Bib Shorts for men keep you cool and comfortable with advanced materials and let you ride at professional levels in style. Shorts are P.R.O. In-R-Cool(R) fabric powered by coldblack(R) for optimal wicking, fast drying and reflective sun protection to keep you cool. Direct-Vent mesh upper is sculpted to fit and includes a media pocket. Anatomical seamless P.R.O. chamois is designed for advanced performance riders, for training and racing. Wide elastic leg bands have sublimated graphics (except for black) and silicone elements for grip so the shorts stay in place. Reflective accents enhance visibility in low light. Pearl Izumi P.R.O. In-R-Cool Bike Bib Shorts offer UPF 50+ sun protection from harmful UV rays.
